text: Hollywood Summer Theater was an American television filmed anthology series that aired on CBS from August 3, 1956 to September 28, 1956. The series was hosted by actor Gene RaymondThe Complete Directory to Prime Time Network and Cable TV Shows 1946-Present. Ballantine Books 2003. pg.542 Among the actors appearing were Merle Oberon, Laraine Day, Joanne Dru, Rod Cameron, Ricardo Montalban, and Preston Foster. ==References== Category:1956 American television series debuts Category:1956 American television series endings Category:CBS original programming Category:1950s American anthology television series Category:Black-and-white American television shows
title: Hollywood Summer Theater
